title: SchoolScoops
description:
Traditional campus tours feel impersonal and can leave you with more questions than answers. You’re just a face in the crowd following a scripted tour led by a random guide. Is this really the best way to make one of the biggest decisions of your life?

SchoolScoops connects college applicants with current students for 1-on-1 campus tours and video chats. SchoolScoops guides tailor each tour to your unique interests and provide valuable insights and answers to your personal questions.
